summary: A disturbed young taxidermist exhumes his recently deceased girlfriend, brings her body to his family villa and proceeds to embalm her corpse, with help from his strange housekeeper. But his bouts of insanity are just beginning.
cast: Kieran Canter|Cinzia Monreale|Franca Stoppi|Sam Modesto|Anna Cardini|Lucia D'Elia|Mario Pezzin|Walter Tribus|Klaus Rainer|Edmondo Vallini|Simonetta Allodi
title: Demencia
